channel.title: Abouts on Jerry Caligiure
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Jerry Caligiure

item.description: My major interests / activities at the time of writing this are: Programming in Go Working on Engo, an ECS game engine written in Go Working on an SVG parser for Go that’ll turn SVGs into a list of commands that can then convert to an image.Image Brushing up on algorithims Studying some physics stuffs Building an IR reader / encoder for Arduino to update my wife’s Tamagochi Also to be able to utilize Alexa to control the TV via IR :P

Projects I’m working on: Engo: An ECS game engine written in Go Summer Vacation: A game built using Engo hypnic: A game made for the open game art game jam. Built using Engo. Gleam: A pure-go window, view, and event library. Inspired by glfw and shiny. Feed Me: A cross-platform RSS feed reader / viewer built using electron, sql, and go.
Hello, my name is Jerry Caligiure. Welcome to my blog! I am a father, husband, software developer, and science and math entusiast Those are the subjects this blog will most likely cover.
